title: Just trying to get the boards to register my level
body: Just a post to hopefully get the forums to notice I'm lvl 5 now.  Ignore me :3  I'll  make another post if it doesn't work.

replies.body: An account will usually need to sync to the boards, and a post can help move that a long.  If it doesn't update in this way, usually waiting it out may be your best bet.  I gave your profile a nudge just in case that might help!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YK6BmOua,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-03T15:44:33.614+0000)
>
> An account will usually need to sync to the boards, and a post can help move that a long.  If it doesn't update in this way, usually waiting it out may be your best bet.  I gave your profile a nudge just in case that might help!

Awesome! Thanks very much!
Whelp so far not working.  Usually fixes this issue.  Weird.  Anyway trying again.
